item.title: Bioconductor Code of Conduct
item.description: Since December 2021 I’m part of the Bioconductor Code of Conduct (CoC). Incidents happening at every Bioconductor conferences can be reported and the committee is responsible to file them and lead to a conflict resolution which will depend on the gravity of the incident.
